items: Initial Certification: The doctor who cared for your loved one completes a Medical Certificate of Cause of Death
Medical Examiner Review: A second doctor reviews the death using medical records
Family Consultation: The Medical Examiner will contact you to discuss their findings and address any questions about your loved one’s care
Final Approval: Once satisfied, the Medical Examiner sends the information to the Registrar
